attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. Purchase this 2017 BMW M2 Coupe M-DCT (F87) now! It is perfect for a car enthusiast as it packs a punch. The 3.0 litre bi-turbo engine produces 272 kW of power and 465 Nm of torque. The quadruple exhaust system sounds aggressive as you start up the engine and take off, this M2 Couple goes from 0 to 100 km/h in a mere 4.3 seconds. It reaches a top speed of 250 km/h. 
Manufacturers' claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 7.9 litres per 100 km. This vehicle provides thrilling performance and an exhilarating driving experience.


ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES.


*ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED
